comment._content: Douglas C-53-DO Skytrooper 42-47371 (DC-3A) N147M cn 7313 Was reportedly 'Billion Dollar One' featured in the movie Richie Rich. (?) Ex N1794B, N67K, N47L, and N943DJ. [http://www.flickr.com/photos/chrisk48/8414420833/] Seen above as N943DJ 'Spirit of Benovia'. Much info here.
